result.name: individual-vehicle-approval-iva
result.notes: Information used to process IVA Applications and is Lotus Notes based, containing report owner personal details and technical information.

organization.name: vehicle-and-operator-services-agency
organization.title: Vehicle and Operator Services Agency
organization.description:
The Vehicle and Operator Services Agency (VOSA) was replaced by Driver and Vehicle Standards Agency (DVSA) in April 2014.

VOSA was an executive agency, sponsored by the Department for Transport.

It existed from 3 April 2003 to 31 March 2014.

Find out more at https://www.gov.uk/vosa

result.title: Individual Vehicle Approval (IVA)
